main event: On 26 July 1949, a civilian observed a metallic-silver unidentified flying object resembling an upside down saucer over Mitchell, Nebraska.
interesting points: The object maintained level flight with a slight dipping motion,The observer saw the object for about 3 minutes before it disappeared behind hills,The object was traveling at an estimated speed of 400 to 500 MPH,The observer initially noticed a bright light reflecting off the object,It was approximately 25 feet in diameter and 3 to 4 feet thick.
